T02D1205:280b-1: shr'i ta ttva pra d'i pam n'a ma tantra m'a l'a panytsi k'a /
T02D1205:280b-3: dpal de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T02D1205:280b-4: dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1205:280b-5: mi gnas rnam rtog kun bral ba'i //
T02D1205:280b-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dngos //
T02D1205:280b-7: rang rig brjod du med pa yi //
T02D1205:280b-8: ye shes chen po la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1205:280b-9: phal pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i //
T02D1205:280b-10: bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi mchog /'di la gzhan gyis gsol bskul bas //
T02D1205:280b-11: ji bzhin don gyis gsal bar bya //
T02D1205:280b-12: drang ba dang ni nges pa'i don //
T02D1205:280b-13: rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa las //
T02D1205:280b-14: nges pa la ni rim pa bzhin //
T02D1205:280b-15: ji bzhin don gyis dbye bar bya //
T02D1205:280b-16: 'di la rdo rje tshig mang ldan //
T02D1205:280b-17: de nyid dam pa 'bras bu'i don //
T02D1205:280b-18: yid bzhin rin chen nor bu yis //
T02D1205:280b-19: phreng ba nyid ni khyab ba'i bdag / dgos pa'i mtshan nyid sgrub byed pa //
T02D1205:280b-21: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1205:280b-22: 'di skad ni skyon dang bral ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin ston pa la'o /
T02D1205:280b-23: bdag gis thos zhes bya ba ni sdud par byed pa kho nas thos pa yin gyi /
T02D1205:280b-24: gzhan du brgyud pa dang gzhan nas thos pas byung ba ma yin no //
T02D1205:280b-25: 'khrul pa bsal ba'i don gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa kho na la thos pa'o //
T02D1205:280b-26: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi
T02D1205:280b-27: bha ga la 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i dus
T02D1205:280b-28: na'o // de yang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas khyad
T02D1205:280b-29: par can ni 'khor dpa' bo dang dpa' mor bcas
T02D1205:280b-30: pa bzhugs pa'i dus gcig go //
T02D1205:280b-31: bcom ldan 'das ni bdud rnam pa bzhi bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1205:280b-32: yang na legs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir na'o //
T02D1205:280b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1205:280b-34: rigs kyis phye ba ni bde ba chen po nyid las gshegs pa ste /
T02D1205:280b-35: gdul bya'i don mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1205:280b-36: yang na de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa ste /
T02D1205:281a-1: rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1205:281a-2: thams cad na ni ji snyed pa bzhugs lus med
T02D1205:281a-3: pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang+g'a'i klung
T02D1205:281a-4: gi bye ma snyed kyis mtshon pa kun bsdu ba
T02D1205:281a-5: yin no // sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje //
T02D1205:281a-6: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku
T02D1205:281a-7: gsung thugs rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung
T02D1205:281a-8: thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid pas na rdo rje
T02D1205:281a-9: 'chang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang de bzhin du lha mo'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pa ni /
T02D1205:281a-10: dpa' bo chen po dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1205:281a-11: sa bcu la gnas pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems
T02D1205:281a-12: dpa' rnams ni nyid las sprul pa'i 'khor gyis bcom
T02D1205:281a-13: ldan 'das la bskor nas bzhugs te /
T02D1205:281a-14: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin shes rab kyi bha
T02D1205:281a-15: ga'i nang gzhal yas khang khyad par can na bzhugs
T02D1205:281a-16: pa'o // sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bzhugs zhes bya'o //
T02D1205:281a-17: der bcom ldan mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1205:281a-18: la bzhugs pa'i gnas de ru bcom ldan 'das la
T02D1205:281a-19: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas mnyes par byas
T02D1205:281a-20: te / gsol ba 'debs par byed pa'i don gyis so //
T02D1205:281a-21: 'di skad ces gsol te zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhus pa'o //
T02D1205:281a-22: gzhan dag ni 'di rnams la nang la sogs pa'i don gyis bshad pa yin zhes smra'o //
T02D1205:281a-23: de ni 'gal te rgyud kyi bka' nyams pa'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1205:281a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1205:281a-25: de la ae wam ma y'a zhes bya ba ni
T02D1205:281a-26: rgyud kyi don thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir na sdom
T02D1205:281a-28: 'dir bsdus nas ston pa yin la /
T02D1205:281a-29: rgyas pa ni 'di nyid kyi 'og nas bstan to //
T02D1205:281a-30: rgyud gzhan nas sdom pa'i don gyis shes rab thabs dang /
T02D1205:281a-31: a'a li dang k'a li dang /
T02D1205:281a-33: lha mo dang skad cig bzhi dang /
T02D1205:281a-35: de kho na nyid bzhi dang /
T02D1205:281a-38: dbyu gu la sogs par yi ge bzhi po 'di dag rnams sbyar bar gsungs so //
T02D1205:281a-39: gzhan nas de bas kyang rgyas par bstan pa yang yod pa yin no //
T02D1205:281b-0: 'o na @281b yang mi 'gal bar bstan dgos so //
T02D1205:281b-1: sogs pa'i sgras bzhugs pa yan chad bsdu ba ste /
T02D1205:281b-2: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na zhes
T02D1205:281b-3: bya ba nas shes rab kyi bha ga la bzhugs
T02D1205:281b-4: so zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
T02D1205:281b-5: khams zhes bya ba'i sgras 'byung ba rnams so //
T02D1205:281b-6: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ngo //
T02D1205:281b-7: srid pa gsum gyi ngo bo lus ngag yid dang ldan pa ni 'dod khams dang /
T02D1205:281b-8: gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang rang rang gi yang khams te gsum mo //
T02D1205:281b-9: 'gro ba ni rnam pa lnga'i rigs kyi sems can /
T02D1205:281b-10: mi 'gro ba ni snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin //
T02D1205:281b-11: yang na mi 'gro ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa la bya'o //
T02D1205:281b-12: phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ni shes rab de dang ldan pa'i thabs ni dngos po'i ye shes so //
T02D1205:281b-13: rang bzhin gyis zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin dga'
T02D1205:281b-14: ba nyid kyis khyab cing rgyas btab nas bzhugs so
T02D1205:281b-15: // de yang kun gyi snying po dam pa ste /
T02D1205:281b-16: kun la gnas pa'i phyir rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D1205:281b-17: rnam par rtog pas mi 'phrogs pa rang bzhin gyis 'od rab spros pa dang bral ba la ni /
T02D1205:281b-18: gzhan gyis ma yin kun rgyas btab //
T02D1205:281b-21: tshangs pa'i g-yul sa byed pa mthar //
T02D1205:281b-22: legs dgyes khyed kyis rab btab nas //
T02D1205:281b-23: grangs med pa la rgyas btab ste //
T02D1205:281b-24: de bas phyag rgya chen khyod grags //
T02D1205:281b-26: dri med rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu nyid //
T02D1205:281b-27: ces bya ba ni de nyid la 'bras bu zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1205:281b-28: de kho na nyid dang mchog tu gyur pa dang /
T02D1205:281b-29: skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa la
T02D1205:281b-30: sogs pa rnam grangs su phye na mang yang ngo
T02D1205:281b-31: bo ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bde ba
T02D1205:281b-33: de rgyud 'di nas gsal bar ston pa yin pa'i
T02D1205:281b-34: phyir de kho na nyid kyi sgron mar grags zhes
T02D1205:281b-35: bya'o // de'i don rgyas par gsungs pa /
T02D1205:281b-36: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1205:281b-37: la ae wam thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud ces
T02D1205:281b-38: bya ste / rgyud ni rgyun gyis rtag par gnas
T02D1205:281b-39: pa thabs dang shes rab ni yab yum sku dang
T02D1205:281b-40: gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin bde ba dang
T02D1205:282a-0: sku mtshan dang dpe byad dang gsung yig 'bru'i rnam pa dang @282a * //
T02D1205:282a-1: thugs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs dang /
T02D1205:282a-2: rdo rje'i rang bzhin bde ba'i bye brag ste /
T02D1205:282a-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa dang dbyer med pa'i rgyud do //
T02D1205:282a-4: thabs ni rdo rje rin po che'i byang chub sems kyi don gyi rnam pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1205:282a-5: shes rab ni padma can gyi rnam par te gnas kyi khyad par gyi rim pas so //
T02D1205:282a-7: ae yi yi ge dbyibs bzang gang //
T02D1205:282a-8: de dbus wam gyis rab tu brgyan //
T02D1205:282a-9: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / bde ba thams cad kyi ni gzhi //
T02D1205:282a-11: ma y'a zhes bya ba'i sgras sdud pa po nyid bcom ldan mo bdag gis thos pa yin la /
T02D1205:282a-12: de sku'i rnam pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1205:282a-14: 'di skad bdag gis de nyid gsum //
T02D1205:282a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1205:282a-16: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rang bzhin rdo rje
T02D1205:282a-17: dang bcas pa'i yig 'bru'i rang bzhin zla ba'i rang
T02D1205:282a-18: bzhin ga bur dang gsum du dbye ba'i cha dang
T02D1205:282a-19: / thig le dang tshul sdud pa po dang /
T02D1205:282a-20: rgyud bcas pa phyi'i gnas la sogs pa'i dbye bas /
T02D1205:282a-21: bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das mos sngon bskul
T02D1205:282a-22: ba byas nas rgyud gsungs pa de bzhin du 'dir
T02D1205:282a-23: yang bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa las thos par
T02D1205:282a-24: gyur pa ni gsang ba'i padma'i lte ba las bzhengs
T02D1205:282a-25: te / bde ba chen po'i bcom ldan 'das la bskul ba byas pas /
T02D1205:282a-26: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin pa'i tshul gyis thos pa'am /
T02D1205:282a-27: go bar gyur pa ni zla ba bde ba mchog
T02D1205:282a-28: thos pa dga' ba'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba
T02D1205:282a-29: ste / sku la sogs pa'i don gyis sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1205:282a-30: chos kyi dga' ba gsum mo //
T02D1205:282a-31: rang bzhin bde ba chen po dang ldan pa ni /
T02D1205:282a-32: bdag nyid kyis dang bcas pa ste //
T02D1205:282a-33: rang bzhin bzhi yi bye brag tu //
T02D1205:282a-35: rang bzhin dga' ba tshul tsam dang bcas pa'i rdo
T02D1205:282a-36: rje nyid las ma 'phros pa ni 'bras bu'i don
T02D1205:282a-37: dam pa spros pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1205:282a-39: don dam par ni shes par bya //
T02D1205:282a-41: shes rab kyi bha ga'i gnas su zla ba bde ba mchog gi sgrar bshad de /
T02D1205:282a-42: phyi la sogs pa'i rim pas phye ba'i gnas so //
T02D1205:282a-43: de khyad par can gyi gnas su gshegs pa ni 'gog go //
T02D1205:282b-0: ye shes kyi stobs su gyur pas na @282b gzhan mchog ste gnas de rang ngo //
T02D1205:282b-1: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi gnas gcig pa ni thos pa'i don to //
T02D1205:282b-2: mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i phyir srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa spangs pa'o //
T02D1205:282b-3: de ni dga' ba gnyis kyi rtog pa med pa
T02D1205:282b-4: yab yum thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa ni
T02D1205:282b-6: bzang ba dang ngan pa dang bral ba bsam du med pa'i dus te /
T02D1205:282b-7: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i dus so //
T02D1205:282b-8: de nyid phyag rgya chen po bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa dang bral zhes de nyid la bya'o //
T02D1205:282b-9: 'o na yang 'bras bu'i ming rgyu la btags pa'o ;
T02D1205:282b-11: bcom ldan 'das ni mtha' zhes bya //
T02D1205:282b-12: rang bzhin dga' ba nyams myong dngos //
T02D1205:282b-14: yang nar rtsa ba'i padma'i gnas mchog tu phra ba dang ldan pas cha /
T02D1205:282b-15: byang chub sems ga bur gyi gzugs kyis thig le nyid /
T02D1205:282b-16: ye shes gsal bas de rang nyid tshul te de kho na nyid gsum zhes bya'o //
T02D1205:282b-17: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ye shes sbyor ba'i tshul tsam /
T02D1205:282b-18: de dkar ba'i gzugs bde ba shin tu 'phel ba
T02D1205:282b-19: ni zla ba bde mchog / de nyid kyis rang
T02D1205:282b-20: bzhin rnams rgyas btab pa'i ngo bos phyag rgya chen
T02D1205:282b-21: po'o // de rnams kyi skyon gyis ma gos pa
T02D1205:282b-22: ni gzhan mchog / rang bzhin dga' ba nyid dga'
T02D1205:282b-23: ba kun gyi mthar thug pas ni mtha' ste /
T02D1205:282b-24: ye shes de rnams kun rdzob pa'i don to //
T02D1205:282b-25: de bzhin du yang rkang mthil du cha'i dngos po /
T02D1205:282b-26: de snying gar thig le bzhugs pa'i gnas su tshul //
T02D1205:282b-27: de kho na nyid gsum mo //
T02D1205:282b-28: dpag med pa'i gnas su tshul tsam zla ba mchog dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1205:282b-29: chos kyi 'khor lo'i sems kyi gnas su mchog / phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin /
T02D1205:282b-30: longs spyod 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gnas su ni gzhan mchog gi ngo bo mtha'/
T02D1205:282b-31: zla ba rgyas pa'i gnas su rdzogs pa ste /
T02D1205:282b-32: rang bzhin dga' ba sku gsum gyi bdag nyid brjod pa dang bral ba'i don to //
T02D1205:282b-33: yang rgyud ye shes thig le las ni de ltar ma gsungs so //
T02D1205:282b-34: gzhan dag snying ga'i mi shigs pa'i bdag nyid kyis
T02D1205:282b-35: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i don gyis
T02D1205:282b-36: bstan pa dang / de nas rim pas longs spyod
T02D1205:282b-37: 'khor lor bstan pa de nas bde ba chen por
T02D1205:283a-1: de yang dang por de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid snying gar gnas pa las /
T02D1205:283a-2: gyen la 'od zer spros pa des zla ba zhu
T02D1205:283a-3: bas bde bar gyur pa zla ba bde mchog phyag
T02D1205:283a-4: rgya chen po chos kyi 'khor lor mtha' dang gzhan
T02D1205:283a-5: mchog / de ni skyed pa'i sbyor drug / de
T02D1205:283a-6: longs spyod la sogs pa sngar bstan pa byas pa
T02D1205:283a-7: ni sbyor ba drug rdzogs pa'i don to zhes smra'o
T02D1205:283a-8: // thams cad ye shes gsum stong nyid //
T02D1205:283a-9: ces bya ba ni srid pa dang mya ngan las
T02D1205:283a-10: 'das pa'i chos thams cad rnam pa gsum gyi rim
T02D1205:283a-11: pas shar tsam na rnam par rtog pa stong pa'o
T02D1205:283a-12: // de yang phung po dang rtsa dang khu ba'i
T02D1205:283a-13: gzugs la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems
T02D1205:283a-14: can rnams la yang snang ba gsum gyi rim pas
T02D1205:283a-15: 'byung zhing ldan te 'khor ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1205:283a-16: 'di gsal bar snang ba'i skabs su 'og nas bshad /
T02D1205:283a-17: 'o na yang sku gsung thugs rtsa'i don gyis bstan
T02D1205:283a-18: pa'i dga' ba gsum gyi ye shes snang bas thams
T02D1205:283a-19: cad do // rnam par rtog pa rim pas chung ba ni stong pa stong nyid ye shes so //
T02D1205:283a-20: rnam rtog mtshan ma'i snang ba spangs pa ni stong pa ste /
T02D1205:283a-21: de nyid kyis ni spangs pa'o //
T02D1205:283a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas phung po lnga la sogs pa /
T02D1205:283a-24: phung po'i sgras rnam par shes pa byang chub kyi
T02D1205:283a-25: sems 'od rab kyi gnas nas de bzhin nyid las
T02D1205:283a-27: de yang snang ba gsum gyi rim pas rang bzhin bzhi ba rdo rje'i sprul par gshegs pa dang /
T02D1205:283a-28: slar nyid kyi gnas su gshegs pa'o //
T02D1205:283a-29: rnam 'byed grags zhes bya ba ni gsum po la
T02D1205:283a-30: rtogs pa bag chags yod pa 'byed pa'i rnam par
T02D1205:283a-31: 'byed pa'o // dang po'i gnas ni rab 'grub byed //
T02D1205:283a-32: ces bya ba ni bde ba chen po las gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan nyid kyis byon nas /
T02D1205:283a-33: yang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'od rab tu gshegs pa ste /
T02D1205:283a-34: don du bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gshegs ni dang po'i gnas so //
T02D1205:283a-35: de ni phung po la sogs thams cad bde ba chen por gyur pa'o //
T02D1205:283a-36: sku ni phyi la sogs pa'i don gyis dbye bar bya /
T02D1205:283a-37: de bzhin du snga phyi bstan pa spang ngo //
T02D1205:283a-38: sku mthong bas dga' ba'i ngo bor gyur to //
T02D1205:283b-0: de la thabs dang @283b shes rab kyis pho dang mo'i dbang po'i rnam par rtog pa 'gags te /
T02D1205:283b-1: mi skye bas na bral ba'o //
T02D1205:283b-2: byung ba'i sgras khu ba la sogs pa rdzas kyi rtog pa dang yang bral ba'o //
T02D1205:283b-3: de bzhin du bde ba'i dga' ba'i rim pa la
T02D1205:283b-4: sogs pa ni phyag rgya bzhi la brten pa'i rnam
T02D1205:283b-5: par rtog pa spangs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1205:283b-6: thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje ni bcom
T02D1205:283b-7: ldan 'das nyid kyis byas pas phyir na rang bzhin
T02D1205:283b-8: dga' ba'i thugs la sogs pa'o //
T02D1205:283b-9: de yang lam gyi rim pas dbye ba ni bya ba yin no //
T02D1205:283b-10: lha mo dbang chen nyi ma skyes //
T02D1205:283b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1205:283b-12: dpa' bo chen po'i sgras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sku'i gzugs kyis so //
T02D1205:283b-13: de bzhin du dpal lha mo rnams kyang bstan pa
T02D1205:283b-14: de rang nyid la bshad pa a'a li dang rtsa
T02D1205:283b-16: byang chub sems thig le bcu drug / dpa' mo'i rtsa'i 'khor lo //
T02D1205:283b-17: de bzhin lte bar byang chub sems thig le bcu drug /
T02D1205:283b-18: g-yas g-yon bcu drug phrag gnyis dpa' mo rtsa'i dngos po'o //
T02D1205:283b-19: dpa' bo mchog gi dga' ba dang dpa' mo bral
T02D1205:283b-20: ba'i dga' ba zhus pa dang 'pho ba dang 'jig
T02D1205:283b-22: dpa' bo byang chub sems ga bur dpa' mo lte ba'i snying po //
T02D1205:283b-23: rang bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba'o //
T02D1205:283b-24: rnam par bskor ro zhes pas lha la sogs pa'i
T02D1205:283b-25: gzugs rtsa dang byang chub sems kyi yi ge la
T02D1205:283b-27: yan lag ni de rnams thams cad bsdu ba'o //
T02D1205:283b-28: khyab pa'i chu yis padma bzhin //
T02D1205:283b-30: gtso bo'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1205:283b-31: dper bstan pa dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1205:283b-32: shes rab de ni tshangs pa'i gnas //
T02D1205:283b-33: zhes bya ba ni gnas dang rten dang bzhi ni rnam grangs so //
T02D1205:283b-34: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i gnas kyi khyad par te /
T02D1205:283b-35: 'dir byang chub sems kyi zla ba'i rang bzhin la tshangs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1205:283b-37: tshangs pa ye shes 'dzin pa'i phyir //
T02D1205:283b-39: ye shes bral ba'i dga' bar 'dzin pa ni rang bzhin dga' bar 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1205:283b-40: bha ga bdud ni 'joms pa'i phyir //
T02D1205:283b-41: zhes bya ba ni gnyid dang rmugs pa dang /
T02D1205:283b-42: the tshom dang 'gyod pa de dag ni lha'i bu'i bdud do //
T02D1205:284a-0: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni nyon @284a * //
T02D1205:284a-2: na tsha la sogs pa phung po'i dang tshe dang dbang po 'gags pa 'chi bdag gi bdud do //
T02D1205:284a-3: 'dir rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po 'joms pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyis so //
T02D1205:284a-4: yang na longs spyod myong bas so //
T02D1205:284a-5: zhes bya ba ni drug dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1205:284a-6: ro dang ye shes longs spyod na bcom ldan 'das
T02D1205:284a-7: bha ga'i don gcig pa ste /
T02D1205:284a-9: bzhugs pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid de //
T02D1205:284a-10: zhes bya ba ni mtshan dang dpe byad dang yig 'bru la sogs pa sngar bshad pa yin no //
T02D1205:284a-11: de bzhin gnas pa yang na gshegs //
T02D1205:284a-12: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dbang gis gnas pa dang bzhugs pas mtshungs //
T02D1205:284a-13: ye shes sems dpa'i don gyis gshegs pa ste /
T02D1205:284a-14: sku'i rnam pas dbye ba dang /
T02D1205:284a-15: gsung dang thugs dang rdo rje'i rang bzhin bde bas dbyer bar bya'o //
T02D1205:284a-16: de lta bu'i don dam par zhes bya ba la
T02D1205:284a-17: sogs pas ni nges pa'i don gyis thabs kyi rim
T02D1205:284a-18: pa gang la brten kyang 'bras bu'i don dam pa
T02D1205:284a-19: rnyed de / 'dir 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa'i don gyis 'thob pa'o //
T02D1205:284a-20: thams cad rnal 'byor rgyud du gsang //
T02D1205:284a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor du sngags so /
T02D1205:284a-23: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud du nges pa dang drang ba'o //
T02D1205:284a-25: ae wam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yab
T02D1205:284a-26: yum thabs dang shes rab kyi rin po che dang
T02D1205:284a-27: padmar ldan pa'i rtsa'i 'khor lo'i gnas kyi rim pa
T02D1205:284a-28: 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02D1205:284a-29: brgyad dang gsum dang de dag rnams dang bcas pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'o //
T02D1205:284a-30: 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhugs pa'i sa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya'o //
T02D1205:284a-31: byang chub kyi sems rang bzhin dga' ba spros pa
T02D1205:284a-32: dang bral ba'i sa thams cad la dbang byed pa
T02D1205:284a-33: yin no // rgyud las ni rtag tu sprul pa sku'i sa bcu gcig pa zhes brjod pa'o //
T02D1205:284a-34: longs spyod rdzogs pa bcu gnyis pa //
T02D1205:284a-35: chos kyi sku ni bcu gsum pa //
T02D1205:284a-36: bcu bzhi bde ba chen po ste //
T02D1205:284a-37: gang zhig bco lnga pa yis //
T02D1205:284a-38: de ni ye shes sar bstan yin //
T02D1205:284a-39: bcu drug sa ni brtag pa mi //
T02D1205:284a-40: de bzhin du rgyas par gsungs so //
T02D1205:284a-41: de kun dga' ba'i bye brag gis //
T02D1205:284a-42: sa yi sgra yis kun du btags //
T02D1205:284b-1: der gang zhig de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag
T02D1205:284b-2: nyid de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim
T02D1205:284b-3: pa ni sngon du ji skad smras pa dang /
T02D1205:284b-4: gnas skabs kyis shes par bya ste /
T02D1205:284b-5: dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba'i lan gsum shukra
T02D1205:284b-6: dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ye shes skye
T02D1205:284b-7: ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dang ma
T02D1205:284b-8: rig pa'i don gyis de nyid la gsungs pa'o //
T02D1205:284b-9: de'i 'bar ba dang zhu ba dang 'dzag pa dang /
T02D1205:284b-12: de bzhin du thun tshod dang 'pho ba rnams dang chu tshod dang /
T02D1205:284b-13: dbyug gu'i don rnams dbye ba ni nang gi rim pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa yin no //
T02D1205:284b-14: ma rig pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur te /
T02D1205:284b-15: de dag rim pas 'byung ba las de kho na nyid ni gsal ba'o //
T02D1205:284b-16: yang na bral ba'i dga' ba las de nyid der gsal bar bstan te /
T02D1205:284b-17: de yang bzang ba dang ngan pa gnyis te /
T02D1205:284b-18: bzang po'i don rnyed pa ni bzhi pa'o ;
T02D1205:284b-20: ji ltar mun pa'i rin po che //
T02D1205:284b-21: mar me med na mthong ba med //
T02D1205:284b-22: de bzhin de kho na nyid ni //
T02D1205:284b-23: lam la sogs pa'i rim pas rnyed //
T02D1205:284b-25: chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po ste /
T02D1205:284b-26: 'di rnams ni de kho na nyid gcig pus bcom zhing dben pa'o //
T02D1205:284b-27: rgyu la 'bras bu'i ming btags pa'o //
T02D1205:284b-30: byang chub kyi sems la kha cig 'dod do //
T02D1205:284b-31: la la ni byang chub kyi sems ni srog la /
T02D1205:284b-32: dbyug pa yang rtsa yin no zhes smra'o //
T02D1205:284b-33: 'dir ni phyi dang nang gi rtsa la dbye bar bya ba ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas su /
T02D1205:284b-34: srog gi rlung gzung zhing dgug pa tsam gyis kyang
T02D1205:284b-35: rtsa mdud sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa ye
T02D1205:284b-36: shes myong ba'i ror gcig pas na /

T02D1205:284b-39: gyen du rdzogs pa'i rim pa gsum ni sbyor ba drug gi don to //
T02D1205:284b-40: yang na autpala'i gnas su rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i don to //
T02D1205:284b-41: mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba'i dga' ba'i don gyis shar ba dang nub pa dang /
T02D1205:284b-42: mi snang ba dang longs spyod rlung dang byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1205:285a-0: yang rang bzhin dga' ba nyid la bshad @285a * //
T02D1205:285a-2: / rlung dang byang chub sems phrad pa las ni
T02D1205:285a-3: dga' ba'i bye brag rang bzhin dga' ba dang ldan
T02D1205:285a-4: nas steng dang 'og gi 'dab mar 'pho ba ni
T02D1205:285a-5: dga' ba'i gnas su sems la dbang ba /
T02D1205:285a-6: mchog gi dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim pas bde ba chen po shar ba'o //
T02D1205:285a-7: rtsa dang byang chub sems su ldan nas gnas khyad
T02D1205:285a-8: par can du bzhag pas ni rang bzhin dga' ba
T02D1205:285a-9: rnyed pas / de lus la sogs pa'i yan lag rgyas pa yin no //
T02D1205:285a-10: bum pa'i dbang dang gsang ba dang //
T02D1205:285a-12: bzhi ba'i gnas kyi rim pa dga' ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dbang gi rim pa'o //
T02D1205:285a-13: dga' ba'i rnam pa'i sems la dbang bzhi pa'i 'bras
T02D1205:285a-14: bu dang bcas pas chad pa'i dga' ba'i bdud rang

T02D1205:285a-17: rdo rje dang rin po che la sogs pa'i mtshams de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs mtshan no //

T02D1205:285a-21: dad pa yin na gzung bar bya'o //

T02D1205:285a-24: gsang ba chen pa'i ye shes mchog / ces bya

T02D1205:285a-27: spros pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i ngo bo /

T02D1205:285a-29: spyod pa'i yul ma yin pa 'di ni thos shing

T02D1205:285a-39: sngags dang / de bzhin du lus la sogs pa'i

T02D1205:285a-42: de bzhin du dga' ba la sogs pa las byung ba'i yid kyi snying po'i sngags dang /
T02D1205:285b-0: de bzhin du shes rab dang thabs gnyis phrad pa'i sa'i don dam @285b pa'i sngags so //
T02D1205:285b-1: gang zhig sku brgyad mchod sbyin ni //

T02D1205:285b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnas dang zhing
T02D1205:285b-4: la sogs pa'i dz'a landha ra la sogs pa'i gnas
T02D1205:285b-5: kyi dbang du bskyed rim bsgom pa'i mtshan ma dang

T02D1205:285b-9: brgyad kyi ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams ni yab
T02D1205:285b-10: yum thabs dang shes rab gnyis las byung ba'i don
T02D1205:285b-11: to // gang zhig mi snang longs spyod dbang //
T02D1205:285b-12: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin //
T02D1205:285b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sku'i don gyi
T02D1205:285b-14: bskyed pa dang de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems
T02D1205:285b-15: rnams las lus la bskyed pa dang /
T02D1205:285b-16: dga' ba la sogs pa gsum rdo rje rin po che gsang ba'i rim pas skyed pa ste /
T02D1205:285b-17: rang bzhin de kho na nyid shar ba la sogs pa'i don to //

T02D1205:285b-20: da ni rim sogs yan lag spangs //
T02D1205:285b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1205:285b-22: bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa
T02D1205:285b-23: la sogs pa bsnyen bsgrub dang /
T02D1205:285b-24: yan lag drug dang bral pa dang /
T02D1205:285b-25: lus kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i yan lag dang /
T02D1205:285b-26: sprul pa'i 'khor lo la gsang ba'i rdo rje rin
T02D1205:285b-27: po che la sogs pa'i dga' ba dang sbyor ba'i
T02D1205:285b-28: yan lag kun gyi bdag nyid spangs pa can gyi

T02D1205:285b-33: lha mo gang zhig gsang ba'i sgra //
T02D1205:285b-34: de ni ye shes gsum dang bral //
T02D1205:285b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dam tshig med
T02D1205:285b-36: pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa la sogs pa ni
T02D1205:285b-37: gsang ba / sku dang gsung dang thugs gsum dang
T02D1205:285b-38: bral ba'i gsum gyi bdag nyid ye shes sems dpa'
T02D1205:285b-39: gsang ba / dang / sku'i 'khor la sogs pa'i
T02D1205:285b-40: bdag nyid dang bcas pa dang srog ma'i rtsa la
T02D1205:285b-41: sogs pa gsum ga bur dang bcas pa las de

T02D1205:285b-44: sku'i gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rtsa ba'i dag pa thabs
T02D1205:285b-45: dang shes rab las byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D1205:286a-0: / mgrin par mchog gi dga' ba mchog tu gsang @286a * //
T02D1205:286a-2: rtse mo'i gnas su bral ba'i dga' ba shin tu gsang ba rnam par 'joms pa la /
T02D1205:286a-3: lte ba'i gnas su rang bzhin dga' ba snang ba
T02D1205:286a-4: la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum dang bral ba'i gsum
T02D1205:286a-5: gyi bdag nyid rnam pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1205:286a-6: yang na de rnams kun kyang gsum ba'i bdag nyid rang bzhin pa de rang nas rnyed pa'o //
T02D1205:286a-7: lha mo gang zhig dam tshig ni //
T02D1205:286a-8: bsrung ba la sogs nges par bstan //
T02D1205:286a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sku rdo rje
T02D1205:286a-10: la sogs pa'i dam tshig bsrung zhing bdud rtsi lnga
T02D1205:286a-11: la sogs pa bza' ba dang /
T02D1205:286a-12: snying gang mi shigs pa nyi zla'i dbus su byang
T02D1205:286a-13: chub sems kyi bdud rtsi dam tshig bsrung zhing bza'
T02D1205:286a-14: ba dang / ye shes kyi dam tshig rang bzhin
T02D1205:286a-15: dga' ba mchog dang bral ba dga' ba'i dbus su
T02D1205:286a-16: bdud rtsi ye shes kyi dam tshig bsrung ba dang
T02D1205:286a-18: 'khor la yang gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1205:286a-20: gang zhig sbyin sreg don dam par ;
T02D1205:286a-21: / de ni ha zhes glo bur pa //
T02D1205:286a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1205:286a-23: zhib dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las rnams kun ji ltar rigs pa bzhin bya ste /
T02D1205:286a-24: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02D1205:286a-25: yang na chu rgyun pa las pa'i don gyis bstan pa'am /
T02D1205:286a-26: 'khor lo rnams la mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ha'i yi
T02D1205:286a-27: ges sbyin par bya ba'i sbyin sreg dang tshul dang
T02D1205:286a-28: cha de'i dbus rnam par rtog pa'i sreg rdzas btsal
T02D1205:286a-29: te / rtsa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags kyis mchod pa'i
T02D1205:286a-30: ha'i sngags kyi thig le'u dbus su mchod sbyin byas
T02D1205:286a-31: pas sbyin sreg ge dga' ba'i 'bras bu bde ba
T02D1205:286a-32: chen po de kho na nyid do //
T02D1205:286a-33: gang zhig bsrub dang bsrub thabs ni //
T02D1205:286a-34: de ni thog ma'i dga' dang bral //
T02D1205:286a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bskyed pa'i thabs
T02D1205:286a-36: dang shes rab las 'byung ba'i dga' ba'i rim pa
T02D1205:286a-38: rkan gyi padma dang rdo rje'i dga' ba'am //
T02D1205:286a-39: 'khor lo'i bsrub pa dang bsrub thabs dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1205:286a-40: de bzhin gnas kyi rim pas bstan te /
T02D1205:286a-41: thog ma dang tha ma gnyis su med pa'i rang
T02D1205:286a-42: bzhin dga' ba mchog dang bral ba'i bsrub pa dang
T02D1205:286a-43: bsrub thabs te / de dag rnams spangs pa'o //
T02D1205:286a-44: lha mo'i gang zhig sngags kyis bzlas //

T02D1205:286b-0: ces bya ba la sogs @286b pa sngags kyi sgras ni thabs shes skyes so //
T02D1205:286b-1: shes rab ni yum thabs ni yab nyid srid pa dang /
T02D1205:286b-2: mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis sbyor pa gnyis dang bral ba dang /
T02D1205:286b-3: srog dang rtsol ba'i rlung 'gog pas de dag bza'
T02D1205:286b-4: bar byas nas de bzhin du mnyam par byas te
T02D1205:286b-5: srog dang rtsol ba la blta bar bya'o //
T02D1205:286b-6: yang na sngags kyi bzlas pa'i don ni dga' ba
T02D1205:286b-7: gsum po srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D1205:286b-8: mtshan nyid can du gsum po'i bdag nyid mchog dang
T02D1205:286b-9: bral ba gnyis kyi ngo bo gnyis dang bral ba'o
T02D1205:286b-11: thig tshul cha dang bral ba dang //
T02D1205:286b-12: thig le tshul dang cha yi nang //
T02D1205:286b-13: rnal 'byor pa yi der yid bsam //
T02D1205:286b-14: cha yi nang du bsam bya ste //
T02D1205:286b-15: yang na tshul gyi nang du'o //
T02D1205:286b-16: tshul yang thig ler bsgom par bya //
T02D1205:286b-17: thig le yang ni stong par 'gro //
T02D1205:286b-18: stong pa rang bzhin dga' ba nyid //
T02D1205:286b-19: gsum dang bral ba bsam skyes mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02D1205:286b-20: lha mo gang zhig gnas brgyad ni //
T02D1205:286b-21: de ni nyi skyes ma'i ni rgyas //
T02D1205:286b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1205:286b-23: gnas brgyad ni dkyil 'khor gyi gdan padmo'i gdan shar
T02D1205:286b-24: phyogs la sogs pa'i gnas dang zhing la sogs pa

T02D1205:286b-28: spyi bo'i rtsa'i padma'i gdan dang ldan pa brgyad dam
T02D1205:286b-29: 'dab ma brgyad pa padma dang lte bar bcas pa'i
T02D1205:286b-30: lhag pa'i byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ba dang

T02D1205:286b-33: gang zhig dga' ba la sogs rim //

T02D1205:286b-38: sna tshogs pa byas pas sa dang po nas sa
T02D1205:286b-40: phyag rgya dang bral nas so sor spyod pa'i khyad
T02D1205:286b-41: par mi 'dra ba sna tshogs pa byas mod kyi

T02D1205:286b-43: pa dang bral ba sa bcu pa'i dbang phyug thob

T02D1205:286b-47: zhes pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa dang /
T02D1205:287a-0: @287a * // rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po nyid //
T02D1205:287a-1: rang dbang gis ni kun du brtags //
T02D1205:287a-3: yang slob dpon aa wa dh'u t'i pa'i gzhung gis
T02D1205:287a-4: las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pas las kyi phyag
T02D1205:287a-5: rgya la brten par bya ba yin te /
T02D1205:287a-6: dbang po'i rim pa dang sbyor la /
T02D1205:287a-7: de nas dam tshig la sogs pa'i rim pa'i phyag rgya la brten te /
T02D1205:287a-8: sa brgyad pa mtshan ma med pa'i don gyis sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnyed pa'o zhes bshad do //
T02D1205:287a-9: 'di rang gi 'og nas ni dang po dga' ba
T02D1205:287a-10: dang bcas pa las dang po la sbyin par bya
T02D1205:287a-11: ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1205:287a-12: gang zhig dur khrod rnam rtog bral //
T02D1205:287a-13: dbugs dbyung la sogs rnam par spangs //
T02D1205:287a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
T02D1205:287a-15: shi ba'i ro la dbugs la sogs pa'i rnam par
T02D1205:287a-16: rtog pa bral ba'i dur khrod kyi bye brag bsgom
T02D1205:287a-17: pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi gnas mchog
T02D1205:287a-18: tu gyur pa'i sa'i dur khrod dang rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1205:287a-19: pa'i dur khrod du gzung ba dang /
T02D1205:287a-20: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa tshig cing bde ba'i
T02D1205:287a-21: ye shes kyi ro myang ba rlung 'byung bas rdul
T02D1205:287a-22: dang bral ba'i ga pur zhu bas bskyed pa dang
T02D1205:287a-23: / rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1205:287a-24: lha mo gang zhi chu yi ngogs //
T02D1205:287a-25: de ni rtog med ma yi mthar //
T02D1205:287a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ye shes thob
T02D1205:287a-27: par bya ba'i gnas kyi dbye ba ni gsang ba'i
T02D1205:287a-28: rin po che snye ma'i kha dang /
T02D1205:287a-29: tshangs pa'i yul sa'i lte ba'i snying po'i gnas de'i
T02D1205:287a-30: don gyis rtog pa med pa'i mtha' ma byang chub
T02D1205:287a-31: kyi sems bde ba'i chu bo 'bab pa'o //
T02D1205:287a-32: yang na srog pa rtsa gsum pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D1205:287a-33: gnas nas bde ba'i chu bo 'bab pa'i gnas te
T02D1205:287a-34: / dga' ba bcu drug gi gnas bgyid pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1205:287a-35: rtog med ma nas ni rtag tu byang chub sems kyi chu 'bab pa ste /
T02D1205:287a-36: srog pa rtsa'i dbus na bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1205:287a-37: dur khrod dang chu ngogs kyi gnas der ni bzhi ba ye shes kyi sku bsgom mo //
T02D1205:287a-38: gang zhig snang ba sogs ye shes //
T02D1205:287a-39: sa dang chu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1205:287a-40: rang bzhin rnams rim pas phung po dang khams la sogs pa la thim /
T02D1205:287a-41: de snang ba dang snang ba mched pa dang snang
T02D1205:287a-42: ba thob pa la thim pa las 'od rang la
T02D1205:287a-43: thim pa'i ye shes spros pa dang bral ba mthong
T02D1205:287a-44: ba'o // 'di'i don ni 'og nas rgyas par gsungs so //
T02D1205:287b-0: gzhan ni 'di skad du 'byung ba'i @287b bzhi yis mtshon pa tsam ste /
T02D1205:287b-1: snang ba bzhi'i ye shes skye ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i rim par bstan zer ro //
T02D1205:287b-2: gang zhig dngos po rten la sogs //
T02D1205:287b-3: de ni bde ba dang por rig / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1205:287b-4: dngos po ni shes rab ma'i lte ba la sogs pa'i sbyor thabs rnams dang po'i dga' ba /
T02D1205:287b-5: rten ni rtsa'i mdud pa'i lte ba rnams dbus kyi dga' ba /
T02D1205:287b-6: ye shes ni rlung dang dga' ba rnams kyi bdag nyid tha ma'i dga' ba /
T02D1205:287b-7: rnam par 'byed pa ni 'od la sogs pa'i thig le rnams bzhi pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1205:287b-8: gzhan yang dngos po ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor
T02D1205:287b-9: lo srog ma'i lte ba dang bcas pa dga' bzhi'i
T02D1205:287b-10: rnam pa'o // rten ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor
T02D1205:287b-11: lo rtsa ro ma'i lte ba dang bcas pa mchog
T02D1205:287b-12: rnam pa'o // gi dga' ba'o // ye shes ni
T02D1205:287b-13: chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin ma'i lte ba dang bcas
T02D1205:287b-15: rnam par 'byed pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo rtog med ma dang bcas pa rang bzhin gyi dga' ba'o //
T02D1205:287b-16: 'dir ni gsang ba'i gnas kyi bye brag gis dga' ba dang /
T02D1205:287b-17: mchog gi dga' ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis gsungs te /
T02D1205:287b-18: bzhi pa rang nyid las spyod pas nges par dbye ba yin no //
T02D1205:287b-19: lha mo gang zhig dur khrod brgyad //
T02D1205:287b-20: de ni bde ba la thim zhes bya ba la
T02D1205:287b-21: sogs pa ni mi zad pa dang mi sdug pa
T02D1205:287b-22: dang / ci sbyang gi tshogs dang 'jigs su rung ba dang /
T02D1205:287b-26: 'jigs byed kyi dur khrod brgyad do //
T02D1205:287b-27: kha dang sna la sogs pa brgyad dang /
T02D1205:287b-28: 'dir ni ga bur kyi [*gyi] rnam pa la dbye ba bya'o //
T02D1205:287b-29: rdo rjer gnas pa rus pa dkar po'i kha dog can dang /
T02D1205:287b-30: de rang tsha bas na nag po'i me 'bar ba dang /
T02D1205:287b-31: bde ba chen po gnas pas mi brten pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1205:287b-32: sbyor ba dang dga' ba rnams ni dum bu dang /
T02D1205:287b-33: mgo bo la sogs pa dang /
T02D1205:287b-34: dga' ba gnyis gong 'og tu 'pho bas sva sva tseg tseg dang /
T02D1205:287b-35: rang bzhin dga' bas ma grub pas phyed tshig pa dang /
T02D1205:287b-36: srog gi rlung phyir mi rgyu bas shin tu tshig pa dang /
T02D1205:287b-37: rtsa'i yan lag kun la ri bong can rgyas pas rus pa dkar po bkram par bstan te /
T02D1205:287b-38: de rnams kyang 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte ba'i rang
T02D1205:287b-39: bzhin dga' ba'i bde bar ro gcig pa'i phyir rnam
T02D1205:287b-40: par rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral
T02D1205:288a-1: khrod brgyad kyi don bde ba chen po bdag med pa'o //
T02D1205:288a-2: gang zhig shing la sogs pa'i don //
T02D1205:288a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dur khrod brgyad
T02D1205:288a-4: kyi don gyis shing brgyad pa'i don go sla ba'o
T02D1205:288a-6: rlung de kho na snying po'i don //
T02D1205:288a-7: de yi rin chen gdu bu'i bde //
T02D1205:288a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni srog ma la
T02D1205:288a-9: sogs pa'i snying po'i don ni phyag rgya rnams la
T02D1205:288a-10: brten te / rlung ma dang gnyid mar ldan pa'am /
T02D1205:288a-11: bde ba'i byang chub sems bzhu nas bcas pa'i ye
T02D1205:288a-12: shes rin po che gsang ba'i gnas su rang bzhin
T02D1205:288a-13: dga' bas de kho na nyid kyi don gsal ba'i
T02D1205:288a-14: rlung gis so // lha mo gang zhig 'jug la sogs //
T02D1205:288a-15: de ni gyen du gzung ba'i rlung //
T02D1205:288a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1205:288a-17: 'jug pa ni g-yon phyogs kyi 'dzin ma /
T02D1205:288a-18: byang chub sems dang ldan nas srog gi rlung gyen du dgug pas rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
T02D1205:288a-19: gnas pa ni rtog med ma nyid la dus rtag tu gnas pa'o //
T02D1205:288a-20: 'gro ba g-yas phyogs kyi ro can ma /
T02D1205:288a-21: longs spyod dang dbang mi snang ba'i ngo bos so //
T02D1205:288a-22: yang na gtum mo 'jug pa'i bya ba byed pa /
T02D1205:288a-23: rtog med ma gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'i don gyis gnas pa /
T02D1205:288a-24: bya gdong ma dang rang bzhin dga' ba ye shes 'gro ba'o //
T02D1205:288a-25: de yang rang bzhin gyi rlung gyen la bzung bas
T02D1205:288a-26: nyams su myong ba'i gnas su bsten pa ni goms
T02D1205:288a-27: pa'i sbyor bas bde ba chen po rnyed pa'o //
T02D1205:288a-28: gang zhig nyer 'gro'i bsam gtan ni //
T02D1205:288a-29: de ni zla ba gyen du byed //
T02D1205:288a-30: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
T02D1205:288a-31: rin po che'i padma'i gsang ba'i padma'i snying ga'i 'og
T02D1205:288a-32: gi sgor gnas pa'i ri bong can rang bzhin dga'
T02D1205:288a-34: yang na snying ga'i nyi zla'i bar na mo'i bde
T02D1205:288a-35: ba'i byang chub sems rim pas bde ba chen po'i
T02D1205:288a-36: 'khor lo nas bde bar spros pa dang bral ba'i
T02D1205:288a-37: gnas su gshegs su gsol ba'o //
T02D1205:288a-38: phyag rgya la brten pa'i rgyu'i phyir na zhes man ngag go //
T02D1205:288a-39: gnas nas ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i man ngag
T02D1205:288a-40: gis yang dag pa'i gnas bde ba can gyi thams
T02D1205:288a-41: cad mkhyen pa'i nye bar 'gro ba'i bsam gtan zhes
T02D1205:288a-42: grags so // gang zhig ye shes thig le ni //
T02D1205:288a-43: de ni drug phyed gsum dang bral //
T02D1205:288a-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid ye shes thig le nyid /
T02D1205:288b-0: phyi la @288b sogs pa'i don gyis bsdus pa rang bzhin dga' ba gsum dang bral ba /
T02D1205:288b-1: dga' ba bco lnga dang yang bral ba bcu drug
T02D1205:288b-2: pa brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin bco lnga sa'i
T02D1205:288b-3: dbang phyug 'pho ba med pa bzhugs so //
T02D1205:288b-4: sngar khungs drangs pa 'di la dgongs pa yin no //
T02D1205:288b-5: gang zhig bdag gi rang ngo mchog de ni stor yang nyams su myong //
T02D1205:288b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1205:288b-7: kyi don phyi nas bstan pa bzhin bcom ldan 'das
T02D1205:288b-9: lha mo mkha' 'gro ma'i rang bzhin rtsa ba'i gzugs kyis sam /
T02D1205:288b-10: 'od kyi ngo bos gsang ba'i padma'i snying gnas bskul ba'i don la gshegs te /
T02D1205:288b-11: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas
T02D1205:288b-12: nas rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas su byon pa'i tha
T02D1205:288b-13: tshig go // de nas yang gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1205:288b-14: bde ba chen po'i gnas su gshegs nas sems can
T02D1205:288b-15: thams cad kyi byang chub sems la bzhugs shing rgyas
T02D1205:288b-17: gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya chen po zhes gsungs so //
T02D1205:288b-18: gang zhig sa rnams dbang byed pa //
T02D1205:288b-19: de ni de nyid drug rang bzhin //
T02D1205:288b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de kho na nyid drug ni /
T02D1205:288b-21: sbyor ba drug gi don gyis de kho na nyid bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid drug dang sbyar bas na /
T02D1205:288b-22: sa rnams dang rim pas sbyar ba'o //
T02D1205:288b-24: gzhan mchog tshig gis brjod du med //
T02D1205:288b-25: rnam par dag pa kho na nyid //
T02D1205:288b-26: thams cad kho na'i bdag nyid phyir //
T02D1205:288b-27: de bas bye brag mi bya'o //
T02D1205:288b-29: de yang 'dir rang gi 'og nas gsungs so //
T02D1205:288b-30: gzhan nas dga' ba'i rim pa dang sbyar ba dang sa'i rim pas bshad par bzhugs so //
T02D1205:288b-31: gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1205:288b-32: de ni dga' ba dga' dang bral //
T02D1205:288b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phung po dang
T02D1205:288b-34: nyon mongs pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa kun ye
T02D1205:288b-35: shes lnga las grub pa'i sku yin te /
T02D1205:288b-36: byang chub sems bde ba dkar po dang ;
T02D1205:288b-37: nag po la sogs pa'i rim pas dga' ba bzhi'i dga' ba'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D1205:288b-38: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das
T02D1205:288b-39: pa'i sgras bral ba'i dga' ba nye bar brtags pa
T02D1205:288b-40: tsam // de las yang rang bzhin dga' ba bde
T02D1205:288b-41: ba chen po nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i don
T02D1205:289a-1: mo gang zhig rgyud bstan pa //
T02D1205:289a-2: de ni bde ba shin tu 'phel //
T02D1205:289a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1205:289a-4: la sogs pa'i rim pa pas don rgyas shing zab
T02D1205:289a-6: phyi la sogs pa'i bde ba'i ye shes rim pas
T02D1205:289a-7: nyams su myong bas 'phel ba dang rgyas pa'i don
T02D1205:289a-8: yin no 'dir gzhi dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin bde
T02D1205:289a-9: ba'i snang ba mar me de'i ngo bo nyid gzhi
T02D1205:289a-10: med pa'i bde ba chen po nyid gsal ba zhes
T02D1205:289a-11: pa'o // yang na rgyu'i rgyud nyid 'bras bur grub pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1205:289a-12: gang zhig phyag rgya che rang bzhin //
T02D1205:289a-13: de ni mi snang tshogs yid 'das //
T02D1205:289a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sku gsum gyi
T02D1205:289a-15: bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin dga' ba
T02D1205:289a-16: brjod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba
T02D1205:289a-17: / rin po che'i gdu bu'i rang bzhin dga' bas
T02D1205:289a-18: mtshon pa'i nyams su myong bas kun gyi bdag nyid
T02D1205:289a-19: kun gyi ngo bo kun spangs pa'o //
T02D1205:289a-21: shar ba ma yin nub ma yin //
T02D1205:289a-22: ma skyes cha ni rtag tu shar //
T02D1205:289a-23: yang dag dri med rnam pa'i 'od //
T02D1205:289a-24: dus dang gnas skabs grol ba'o //
T02D1205:289a-27: rnal 'byor pa yis rnyed dka' ba //
T02D1205:289a-28: de yang thabs rab kyis rnyed la //
T02D1205:289a-29: thabs rab med na rnam yang min //
T02D1205:289a-31: ji ltar bskur ba'i thabs dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1205:289a-32: gang zhig gsang ba don dam par //
T02D1205:289a-33: de ni nang gi reg bya ste //
T02D1205:289a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mchog gi gsang
T02D1205:289a-35: ba rnyed par dka' ba ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'i
T02D1205:289a-36: rin po che'i nang du byang chub kyi sems bstan
T02D1205:289a-37: pas nang gi reg bya 'jam pa phra ba'o //
T02D1205:289a-38: de la mtshan ma'i rnam pa dang bral ba'i reg
T02D1205:289a-39: bya dang bral ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba gsang ba
T02D1205:289a-41: yang na dga' ba'i bye brag gi mtshan ma spangs
T02D1205:289a-42: pa brjod du med pa'i dga' ba dag cing dri
T02D1205:289a-43: ma med pa'o // de skad du /
T02D1205:289a-44: ji ltar gzhon pa'i chags dga' dang //
T02D1205:289a-45: ji ltar lkugs pa'i rmi lam bzhin //
T02D1205:289a-47: de nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid rang bzhin dga' ba nam mkha' bzhin gos pa med pa'o //
T02D1205:289a-48: gang zhig bskul ba'i mchod pa'i don //
T02D1205:289a-49: de ni dri med bde ba 'byung //
T02D1205:289a-50: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba nyid du gyur pa la /
T02D1205:289b-0: mkha' 'gro ma'i @289b 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu
T02D1205:289b-1: drug ldan la sogs pas bskul ba ni mthong ba'i
T02D1205:289b-2: thabs so // de nas ji lta ba bzhin rang bzhin dang tha dad par mthong ba dang /
T02D1205:289b-3: yang nyid rang bzhin dga' ba'i don gyis bzhugs pa bzhin //
T02D1205:289b-4: bde ba chen po'i bcom ldan 'das la rtsa'i 'khor
T02D1205:289b-5: lo rnams dang bcas pa'i 'od zer bcas pa'i sgras
T02D1205:289b-6: bskul bas // 'khor lo la sogs pa'i khyad par
T02D1205:289b-7: can gyi dga' ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa mthong ba
T02D1205:289b-10: rdo rje 'dzin pa bde ba chen //
T02D1205:289b-11: gnas mchog dam pa kun na bzhugs //
T02D1205:289b-12: bcom ldan 'das ni bde chen gnas //
T02D1205:289b-13: sprul sku rdo rje gdan gnas bzhugs //
T02D1205:289b-15: de rang bzhin dga' ba'i don la gzigs te /
T02D1205:289b-17: 'das pa la ni yang skye ba //
T02D1205:289b-18: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis sngar gshegs pa'i lam yang skyes pa ste /
T02D1205:289b-19: kun du rgyas pa'i phyir ro /
T02D1205:289b-20: phyis slar la bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i gnas
T02D1205:289b-21: su gshegs pa ni skye ba de la 'phel ba'o
T02D1205:289b-22: zhes bya ste / mchog gi dga' ba'i don gyis
T02D1205:289b-23: rtsa'i mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa kun bde ba
T02D1205:289b-25: lha mo shes rab ye shes gang //
T02D1205:289b-26: de ni kha dang snying gar bde //
T02D1205:289b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin shes rab dang ye shes dbye'o //
T02D1205:289b-28: 'di rin po che kha'i gnas su shes rab kyi dbang de'i snying gar ye shes kyi don to //
T02D1205:289b-29: de nas gzhi dang rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
T02D1205:289b-30: yang shes rab kyi khar shes rab /
T02D1205:289b-31: de nas slar gyi thabs kyi snying gar ye shes de'i rang bzhin bzhi pa'o //
T02D1205:289b-32: gang zhig gsang ba yi dkyil 'khor //
T02D1205:289b-33: de ni ga pur 'pho med bde //
T02D1205:289b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgras rdul tshon dang /
T02D1205:289b-35: me tog dang dri zhim pa sna tshogs pa'i 'khor lo de rnams kyi don gyi khu ba /
T02D1205:289b-36: steng 'og gi gnas su mi 'pho ba rang bzhin
T02D1205:289b-37: dga' ba me tog la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D1205:289b-39: yang na bde chen la sogs pa'i sgras ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1205:289b-40: ye shes rnam par rtog pa spangs pa bde chen
T02D1205:289b-41: byang chub sems zhes rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag
T02D1205:290a-1: de yang tshangs pa'i yul sa'i sgras so //
T02D1205:290a-2: lha mo gang zhig tshig rgyas pa //
T02D1205:290a-3: de ni bya gdong khong du chud //
T02D1205:290a-4: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1205:290a-5: rdo rje dang padma'i lte bar gnyis kyi bye brag dbyer med par byas la /
T02D1205:290a-6: rang bzhin byang chub sems rgyas pas de kho na nyid do //
T02D1205:290a-7: yang na mchog gi gnas gang yang rung ba'i tshig
T02D1205:290a-8: rgyas pa zhu ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i
T02D1205:290a-9: bde ba'i ye shes dngos po spangs ba'i de nyid
T02D1205:290a-10: do // 'byung ba bsrung don gtor ma gtang //
T02D1205:290a-11: de ni srog chags gsad pa'o //
T02D1205:290a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1205:290a-14: sems can kun gyi snying po'i rang bzhin can 'di rin po che'i 'khor lor bsrung bar bya /

T02D1205:290b-18: gzhan nas sangs rgyas yod ma yin //

T02D1205:290b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan bka' stsal ba'o //

T02D1205:290b-41: sum cu rtsa gnyis chu tshod ni nang la sogs pa'i chu tshod dang /

T02D1205:291a-4: 'byung bar gyur pas de yi tshe //
T02D1205:291a-5: srog gi rlung ni gyen la 'gro //
T02D1205:291a-6: sos pa'i rlung ni lte bar gnas //

T02D1205:291a-8: spyi gtsug las ni thur 'gro na //
T02D1205:291a-9: sos rlung de ni rang gnas 'gro //
T02D1205:291a-10: sos rlung lte bar bstan pa'o //

T02D1205:291a-14: rtsa dang khu ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad

T02D1205:291a-24: sos pa'i rlung 'byung ba'i dus su //
T02D1205:291a-26: srog dang phung po la sogs pa dang lus ngag

T02D1205:291a-31: kyi nang gi lte ba'i srog gi rtsa dang bcas

T02D1205:291a-36: 'dir dbus ma'i lam nas snying po de nyid 'jug
T02D1205:291a-37: pa ni rin po che'i snye ma'i gnas su'o //
T02D1205:291a-38: 'jug pa tsam gyis zur brgyad pa'i nang nas yod
T02D1205:291a-39: pa'i bde ba chen po srog gi rgyal po la
T02D1205:291a-40: zhes bya ba zur brgyad pa'i nang na ni 'dab

T02D1205:291a-43: yod pa'i bde ba chen po srog gi rgyal po

T02D1205:291a-45: rnam pa can / nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa bde ba'i rgyal po'o //
T02D1205:291a-46: la zhes bya ba ni rten gyi don gyis bzhi pa'i rten gyi rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //

T02D1205:291b-0: pa'o @291b zhes bya ba la de kho na nyid

T02D1205:291b-2: gsang ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil du 'dus

T02D1205:291b-6: thabs dang shes rab bsrubs pa yis //

T02D1205:291b-9: sdong bu dbu ma'i lam nas 'byung //
T02D1205:291b-10: srog rlung lte ba'i rtsa bar ni //

T02D1205:291b-15: byang chub sems ni brtan 'gyur ro //
T02D1205:291b-17: de'i dus su gang zhig bdag dang gzhan gyi bye
T02D1205:291b-18: brag mi byed cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa

T02D1205:291b-20: dbang gi don zhus pa lha mos gsol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D1205:291b-35: la la ni theg pa chen po dang rdo rje

T02D1205:292a-0: lha mos gsol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni zhu ba gsol @292a * //
T02D1205:292a-2: / lan du sa la sogs pa ma rnyed pa rnams la /

T02D1205:292a-5: dbang gi sta gon dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i
T02D1205:292a-6: cho ga gsungs pa bzhin du dbang bskur ba la

T02D1205:292a-12: brtson 'grus la sogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa ste //

T02D1205:292a-16: gnyis su med pa nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1205:292a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa yin no //

T02D1205:292a-26: sangs rgyas byang chub bla med yin //

T02D1205:292a-29: khyod kyi rang ngo bdag gis shes //
T02D1205:292a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni khu ba'i tshig go //

T02D1205:292a-38: bu mthar phyin pa ni kun du 'od yin la

T02D1205:292b-0: rigs lnga la sogs bstan pa @292b yang ;

T02D1205:292b-16: bzhi pa de kho na nyid grags //

T02D1205:292b-21: de ltar rang bzhin dga' ba'i ye shes de bstan
T02D1205:292b-22: pa'o // de bzhin ye shes las byung shes ni

T02D1205:292b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dpe dang don

T02D1205:292b-38: zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang /

T02D1205:293a-2: sems las byung ba snang ba mched pa'i ye shes te /

T02D1205:293a-9: don dbye bas shes par bya ba ni sems ni

T02D1205:293a-12: 'di ltar ston ka'i dus su dri me med pa'i

T02D1205:293a-14: bas khyab pa bzhin gyis gsal ba'i phyir dngos po

T02D1205:293a-16: nyin mo'i rang bzhin sems las byung ba zhes bya
T02D1205:293a-17: ba ni snang ba mched pa'i ye shes kyi bdag
T02D1205:293a-18: nyid can / yang ji ltar ston ka'i dus su

T02D1205:293a-20: tu gsal zhing dri ma med pa nyid kyi dngos

T02D1205:293a-28: mi rgyu ba'i bdag nyid snang ba thob pa'i ye shes so //

T02D1205:293a-34: mtshan ma la sogs pa las grol ba /

T02D1205:296b-35: ba'i dus ni sems can las dang skal bar ldan
T02D1205:296b-36: pa rnams la bshad pa ci su zhig ces pa
T02D1205:296b-37: ni gang zhig lags zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1205:296b-38: de'i don gyi lan gsungs pa ni /
T02D1205:296b-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1205:296b-40: ma 'ongs dus na byang phyogs su //
T02D1205:296b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1205:296b-42: de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i snying
T02D1205:296b-43: po rab mchog rgyal gyur cig ces bya ba la
T02D1205:296b-44: sogs pa la / bcom ldan 'das nyid la bstod pa ste /
T02D1205:296b-45: sku gsum gyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1205:296b-46: po'i khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la khyab
T02D1205:296b-48: bskyed pa'i rim pa la sogs pa'i don gyis /
T02D1205:296b-49: rgyud kyi rim par zhugs pa dang /
T02D1205:296b-50: 'bras bu'i ngo bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis dang /
T02D1205:297a-1: bzhin dbyer med pa'i bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa'i phyir na /
T02D1205:297a-2: kun gyi bdag nyid kun dang bral ba'i de kho na nyid kyi bstod pa'o //
T02D1205:297a-3: rgyud rnams kun gyi snying po las //
T02D1205:297a-4: snying po'i yang snying mchog gyur pa //
T02D1205:297a-5: de nyid nges don 'di yi rgyud //
T02D1205:297a-6: kun gyi 'bras mchog dam pa yi //
T02D1205:297a-7: ma rig rmongs par gyur pa dag / dbang bskur la sogs med pa la //
T02D1205:297a-8: 'di yi don gsal byed pa gang //
T02D1205:297a-9: de kun bdud kyis bsdus pa'o //
T02D1205:297a-10: gang zhig 'di don sgrub mi byed //
T02D1205:297a-12: lus sems thang chad nyon mongs la //
T02D1205:297a-14: zab mo'i don rnams brjod pa dang //
T02D1205:297a-15: bag med 'khrul par gyur na yang //
T02D1205:297a-16: rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs rnams kun //
T02D1205:297a-17: 'gal ba mchis na bzod par mdzod //
T02D1205:297a-18: tshig dang yi ge la brten nas //
T02D1205:297a-19: 'di yi don ni gsal bar bshad //
T02D1205:297a-20: de yi bsod nams kyis thob pa'i //
T02D1205:297a-21: dge bas 'gro kun sangs rgyas shog / dpal de
T02D1205:297a-22: kho na nyid kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel rin chen
T02D1205:297a-24: rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po'i mchog / ma h'a su kha ta badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
